promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a chibi cute rare eagle electric-type with a yellow and black tail. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or electric. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Yelloquill, a chibi cute rare eagle electric-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: discharge, electro-drift. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word eagle or electric or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, eagle-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, yellow and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Yelloquill nests high in sunny mountains. Its bright plumage sparks with electricity, soaring through the air to search for prey.
